mapper.select: select test_id from test_info where ext_id = #{ext_id} order by test_id desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into test_info (test_id, test_title, test_file, test_file2, test_file3, test_date, test_time, ext_id) values (#{test_id}, #{test_title}, #{test_file}, #{test_file2}, #{test_file3}, #{test_date}, #{test_time}, #{ext_id})
insert into prob_info (prob_id, prob_answ, test_id) values (#{prob_id},#{prob_answ}, #{test_id})
insert into exam_info (user_id, test_id, test_state) values (#{user_id},#{test_id}, #{test_state})
mapper.select: select t.*, e.test_state from test_info t, exam_info e where ext_id = #{ext_id} and t.test_id = e.test_id order by t.test_id desc
select t.*, count(p.prob_id) AS 'prob_count' from test_info t, prob_info p where t.test_id= #{test_id} and t.test_id = p.test_id
mapper.insert: insert into test_result (prob_id, user_id, test_id, stu_result) values (#{prob_id},#{user_id}, #{test_id}, #{stu_result})
mapper.update: update exam_info set test_state = "clear" where test_id = #{test_id}
mapper.select: select a.prof_photo from user_info a, ext_info b where a.user_id=b.user_id and b.ext_id=#{ext_id} and a.user_grade='teacher'
